channel.title: Dragon Claws Special Attack
channel.description: Ok so I have Dragon Claws added on my server and client, and I can't get the Special Attack to work. Can someone please help me with this? And I also want to make it so that when I wield D claws it takes off the shield, so it doesnt have a shield and claws on. Allstar source 317
